sentences.sContent: In English we call it an abacus.
sentences.sCn: 在英语里我们叫它为一个算盘。

sentences.sContent: In response to declining math skills among their students, some Japanese schools are bringing back an ancient calculating device - the abacus.
sentences.sCn: 为了改善学生日渐衰退的计算能力，日本的一些学校重新使用起一个古老的计算工具-算盘。

trans.tranOther: a frame with small balls that can be slid along on thick wires, used for counting and calculating
